metrics.name: Total overdue invoice amounts
metrics.description: Sum of all invoice amounts that are overdue (converted in USD)
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM(${itc_ecc_s4h_amount_conv}) FILTER(
	 WHERE (${itc_ecc_s4h_clearing_date} IS NULL)
		AND ${itc_ecc_s4h_due_date} < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())
	)

metrics.name: Number of open overdue invoices
metrics.description: Number of invoices that are currently open and overdue
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${itc_ecc_s4h_clearing_date} IS NULL)
		AND ${itc_ecc_s4h_due_date} < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())
)

metrics.name: Average time invoice creation to invoice clearing
metrics.description: Average time from invoice creation to invoice clearing within a reference period
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(${itc_ecc_s4h_clearing_date}) 
		WHERE ((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION ${itc_ecc_s4h_invoice_clearing_period}))
	-(SELECT LAST(${itc_ecc_s4h_posting_date})
		WHERE ((NOW() - LAST(end_time)) < DURATION ${itc_ecc_s4h_invoice_posting_period}))
	)

metrics.name: Average time post goods issue to invoice creation
metrics.description: Average time from posting goods issue to invoice creation
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) 
	WHERE event_name IN (${itc_ecc_s4h_invoice_creation_events})) 
	-
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) 
	WHERE event_name IN (${itc_ecc_s4h_shipping_events}))
)

metrics.name: No payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of overdue invoices from all open invoices
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT (case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${itc_ecc_s4h_clearing_date} IS NULL AND ${itc_ecc_s4h_due_date} < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
	)
/ COUNT (case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE (${itc_ecc_s4h_clearing_date} IS NULL)) * 100

metrics.name: Dunning rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were dunned

metrics.name: Automation rate for invoice clearing
metrics.description: Percentage of automated invoice clearing events

metrics.name: Duration of dunning blocks
metrics.description: Average lead time from setting a dunning block to removing the last dunning block
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER 
		(WHERE event_name IN (${itc_ecc_s4h_remove_dunning_block_events})))
	-
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER
		(WHERE event_name IN (${itc_ecc_s4h_set_dunning_block_events})))
)

metrics.name: Days Sales Outstanding (DSO)
metrics.description: Average number of days to collect revenue, weighted by the invoice value

metrics.name: Late payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared 1 day after their due dates

metrics.name: Early payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared more than 5 days before their due dates

metrics.name: On-time payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared less than 5 days before and no later than 1 day after their due dates

metrics.name: No-Touch invoice processing rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices with no change events
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE NOT (event_name MATCHES(${itc_ecc_s4h_no_touch_condition})) 
		AND (event_name MATCHES(${itc_ecc_s4h_clear_invoice_events}))
)
/ (COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${itc_ecc_s4h_clear_invoice_events}))
	)
* 100

metrics.name: Invoices without billing doc from SO
metrics.description: Invoices without Billing Document from Sales Order

metrics.name: Percentage of reversed invoices
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were reversed

metrics.name: Percentage of baseline date changes
metrics.description: Percentage of Baseline Date Changes after the Invoice was posted to SAP
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${itc_ecc_s4h_change_baseline_date})
		AND event_name MATCHES(${itc_ecc_s4h_posting_to_baseline_update_events}))
/
COUNT(case_id)
* 100

variables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_invoice_clearing_period
variables.description: Reference time period to monitor invoice creation to clearing times within, for example the last 60 weeks: '60weeks'

variables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_invoice_posting_period
variables.description: Reference time period to monitor clearing of invoices within, for example the last 60 weeks: '60weeks'

variables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_dunning_condition
variables.description: Condition defining that an invoice has already been dunned, for example "InvoiceLastDunnedOn" IS NOT NULL

defaultValues.defaultValue: "Last Inv. Item Dunned On" IS NOT NULL

variables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_automation_condition
variables.description: Condition indicating that an event was automated, for example "Event Created By User Type" <> 'Dialog'

variables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_early_payment_condition
variables.description: Number of days an invoice clearing is considered to be too early

variables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_late_payment_condition
variables.description: Number of days an invoice clearing is considered to be too late

variables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_no_touch_condition
variables.description: Events that need manual intervention on an invoice and contradict the no-touch rate

defaultValues.defaultValue: ('Remove Dunning Block'|'Set Dunning Block'|'Change Dunning Block'|'Send 1st Overdue Notice'|'Update Baseline Date'|'Update Payment Term'|'Reverse Invoice')

variables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_invoice_creation_events
variables.description: Events identifying the creation of invoice items, for example 'Create Invoice'

variables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_shipping_events
variables.description: Events identifying that the goods have been shipped, for example 'Record Goods Issue'

variables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_invoice_reversal_events
variables.description: Event identifying the reversal of an invoice, for example 'Reverse Invoice'

variables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_clear_invoice_events
variables.description: Event identifying the clearing of an invoice, for example 'Clear Invoice'

variables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_set_dunning_block_events
variables.description: Event identifying the setting of a dunning block for an invoice, for example 'Set Dunning Block'

variables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_remove_dunning_block_events
variables.description: Event identifying the removal of a dunning block for an invoice, for example 'Remove Dunning Block'

variables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_clearing_date
variables.description: Attribute identifying the clearing date of an invoice, for example "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"

variables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_posting_date
variables.description: Attribute identifying the posting date of an invoice, for example "Inv. Posting Document Date"

variables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_due_date
variables.description: Attribute identifying the due date of an invoice, for example "Last Inv. Item Due Date"

variables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_amount_conv
variables.description: Attribute identifying the amount (converted to USD) of an invoice, for example "Inv. Converted USD Amount"

variables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_billing_doc_to_invoice_events
variables.description: Billing Document to Invoice event flow

variables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_posting_to_baseline_update_events
variables.description: Invoice Posting to Baseline date changes event flow

variables.name: itc_ecc_s4h_change_baseline_date
variables.description: Events that describe a change in baseline date, for example 'Update Baseline Date'
